attributes.review: I expected this app to give me the best news on my favorite most favorite President Trump. But once I signed up it kept on telling me things like “make America great again” when really, it was never great. Therefore this app lies so it’s a no for me.
attributes.title: Not reliable

attributes.review: This app gave my phone so many racist, misogynistic, ignorant, pro-life, viruses and almost broke my phone 🤢😱😱😱😱 I cant believe I thought this would be a good idea, it’s almost like I had no common sense 😓 anyway 0/10 would burn this app to the ground 🤠🤠🤠
attributes.title: Horrible!! 🤢

attributes.review: This app is a joke. I can’t even open the app. It’s absolutely so garbage of an app, it glitches my phone every time I try to open the up & when I do finally succeed to open the app, it just immediately crashes
attributes.title: RATE 1 STAR !!

attributes.review: This horrible app man caused lag on my phone. It also made my phone slow and it was spamming my phone with text completely unacceptable I see what you try to do but don’t do it again 🧚🏼‍♀️✨
attributes.title: Awful !0/5🤢

attributes.review: i wish i could give this app 0 stars!!!! it's the worst of the worst!!!! as soon as i opened the app my phone screen shattered and then my phone just exploded!!! 😧 now i have to purchase a new phone!!! trump 2020?? more like BUY ME A NEW PHONE 2020!!!! 😡
attributes.title: absolutely awful!!

attributes.review: This is literally the worst app my dinosaur was scared of the floor because he killed him and then revived himself to tell me then my ps4 ran away because the kids in th basement were bulking it and then the Xbox left because it was x with marks the spot (I know this does not make sense but frik it
attributes.title: Worst app

attributes.review: So I had got this app hoping it will be Greta to update on Donald trumps stuff and ammediatly as soon as I opened it my PHONE WAS SO LAGGY it wouldn’t stop everything kept turning of and doing stuff on its own and at one point it even called my friend
attributes.title: Glitching phone

attributes.review: User interface is really difficult to use, and once you get it to work all the information is false? I thought trump didn’t like fake news but it’s all over this app 🧚🏼
attributes.title: Why?

attributes.review:
like how can u when presented with facts and evidence just mentally decide to ignore it? he’s homophobic, sexist, racist, and a rapist! why would u willingly support that!?! i am ashamed to be an american and i know i’m not the only one. so yeah if u enjoy this app just know ur responsible for all of his actions including:
-his 40+ allegations(one of them being from his own daughter)
-taking adoption rights away from the lgbtq community 
-not allowing trans people in the military
-not doing anything over the countless school shootings
-victim shaming sexual assault survivors 
-mocking people with disabilities 
-his once best friend being involved with a huge human trafficking scheme
(no one truly supports biden! and we r not excusing his actions unlike u guys are for trump. we are settling for biden)
attributes.title: if u support this man u r dumb!

attributes.review: This app absolutely causes loss of brain cells! The longer I had the app, the dumber I got. This app even made me forget how to eat. I was on the brick of starvation and all this dumb useless app did was laugh. Can’t believe the stupidity this app represents. Will not recommend! 😡😡
attributes.title: Worst decision ever
